Articles.Content:
Hi,

I did a few searches and turned up nothing, so I assume this might be part of another mod.

Basically, I'm looking for a mod that would show me both the dry CoM and wet CoM in VAB/SPH, in order to make spaceplane building a bit easier.

Any suggestions?

Edit: And yes, I know I can just remove the fuel from the tanks in VAB/SPH, but if I have, say, 20ish fuel tanks attached...

RCS Build Aid has a dry CoM indicator. It even lets you decide what you consider "dry" on a per-resource basis. If you're taking an RCS tank in a resupply ship for example, and wont actually use the monopropellant it can only count the other resources and treat monopropellant as the mass of the ship.

RCS Build Aid has a dry CoM indicator. It even lets you decide what you consider "dry" on a per-resource basis. Awesome, thanks!
